trait.name: Flyby
entries: The beast doesn't provoke {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

action.name: Beast's Strike
entries: {@atkr m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + 3} plus your Wisdom modifier Slashing damage.
